splashScreen.description: To preserve everything and from everywhere. For access everywhere and from anywhere

testing.title: Help development
testing.description: The project is currently under active development and is not available to the public, but you can join and help make it faster. Bonuses will be available for all testers upon release

email.label: Email
email.errorAlreadyUse: Application from this mail already exists

reason.label: Reason
reason.errorValid: Message length must not exceed 500 characters

form.failedSend: Failed to send your application, please try again later

thankScreen.title: Thank you, {{name}}
thankScreen.description: We will notify you by email when we are ready to connect you to testing.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-platform
crossPlatform.description: One of the most important goals, the creation of a product, when working with which you will not need to think about what system you use it on, you can access it from almost any device

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Ease of use is also very important, so that anyone can use the product without special difficulties and skills.

comfortable.title: Comfortable
comfortable.description: The product should be user-friendly, with a good understandable UI / UX

review.label: Review text
review.errorValid: Message length must not exceed 500 characters

form.failedSend: Failed to send feedback, please try again later

thankScreen.title: Thank you!
thankScreen.description: We will analyze your review, and if necessary, we will answer you by mail
